import * as React from "react"; import { Container, Button, Form } from "react-bootstrap"; import { useOutletContext} from "react-router-dom"; import Loading from "./Loading"; import MFA from "./MFA"; import useSignForm from "./useSignForm"; export default function SignUpForm() { const [, dispatchUser, users] = useOutletContext(); const { handleChange, handleSubmit, values, errors, } = useSignForm("signup") return ( Logging in

Sign up

First name Last name Email The email already exists Password Use 8 or more character with a mix of lowercase and uppercase letters, numbers & symbols Confirm Password Passwords are not identical Use 8 or more character with a mix of lowercase and uppercase letters, numbers & symbols
); }
